name: Haven Family House (LifeMoves)
description: Interim shelter and supportive services for 23 families experiencing homelessness; serves up to 9 veteran families nightly
fullDescription: Haven Family House is a LifeMoves interim housing facility in Menlo Park providing shelter and comprehensive services for families experiencing homelessness, with dedicated capacity for veteran families.
whatTheyOffer:
- Interim shelter for 23 families
- Dedicated veteran family capacity (9 families)
- Supportive services included
- Case management
- Housing placement assistance
- Family-focused environment
howToGetIt:
1. Contact LifeMoves for referral
2. Complete intake assessment
3. Demonstrate family homelessness
4. Veterans receive priority placement
5. Accept shelter placement if available
6. Work with case manager on housing plan
keywords: Haven Family House, LifeMoves, family shelter, Menlo Park, homeless families, veteran families, interim housing
